sub_topic: Finding the area of a parallelogram.
message_1: A parallelogram has a base of 6.5 cm and a height of 9 cm. Calculate the area of the parallelogram.
message_2:
To calculate the area of a parallelogram, we use the formula:

Area = base × height

In this case, the base is 6.5 cm and the height is 9 cm. So, the area of the parallelogram is:

Area = 6.5 cm × 9 cm = 58.5 square centimeters
